primal.name: Zero Civilization / Primal
primal.notes: No permanent settlements; territorial megafauna, spirits, clans.

fantasy.name: Fantasy World
fantasy.notes: Medieval assumptions; roads, castles, ruins of older ages.

industrial.name: Industrial / Early Modern

apocalypse.name: Apocalypse / Post-Collapse
